briefTitle: Aromatase (CYP19) Polymorphism Between AI-responsive and AI-resistant Breast Cancer in Korea
officialTitle: Aromatase (CYP19) Polymorphism Between AI-responsive and AI-resistant Breast Cancer in Korea
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* hormone receptor positiveBreast cancer patient
* postmenopausal women
* first user of aromatase inhibitor

Exclusion Criteria:

* premenopausal
* The patient who take the other antihormonal therapy
* osteoporosis patients
